changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "tb_wallet" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "updated_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "user_id" UUID NOT NULL, "name" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Minha Carteira', "network" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "address" CHAR(42) NOT NULL, "seed_encrypted" TEXT NULL, "is_custodial" BOOLEAN NOT NULL, "is_active" BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE, "verified_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, --- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "tb_user"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE ("address") );
